title: HANDRESY AHO

verses.1:
Matetika manonja re
Ity ranomasin-dozabe
Hanafotra ahy handentika ahy
Hanary ahy tsy ho Anao
verses.2:
Ny ahiahy ariako
Ny tahotra tsy ampingako
Tsy mba ho ahy intsony re
Izany tsy finoana
verses.3:
Naripakao resy avokoa
Reo fahavalo teo aloha
Nanenjika ahy, nandreraka ahy
Fa hay namonjy ahy Hianao.
verses.4:
Mijoro eo anilako
Andro aman'alina Hianao
Ka raha tojo ady mafy
Dia mbola hiantso sy hihira hoe:

chorus:
Handresy aho (in-2)
Handresy tokoa aho Jeso
Satria Hianao (in-3)
No tokiko.
